author: Laura Hagg
text: Just read Emily Elledge's interesting post about the City of Roanoke's cool Green Roof (http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/blogs/blogpost/704/Green_Roofs)  and the building of "green walls" in Mexico.  I would love to hear about other  ICMA members and  KN users who have installed green roofs!  Let us know so we can share here and on our new CityLinks website - icma.org/citylinks.
title: Who has a green roof?
